oai_dc:dc.dc:title: NEW STABILITY FORMULA FOR WAVE-DISSIPATING CONCRETE BLOCKS COVERING HORIZONTALLY COMPOSITE BREAKWATERS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hanzawa, Minoru
Sato, Hirokazu
Takahashi, Shigeo
Shimosako, Kenichiro
Takayama, Tomotsuka
Tanimoto, Katsutoshi
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: wave dissipation
concrete blocks
breakwater
composite breakwater
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A new stability formula for wave-dissipating concrete blocks covering horizontally composite breakwaters is proposed after reviewing the existing stability formulae and verified using experimental data. A method for estimating the expected value of the accumulated damage to wave-dissipating concrete blocks within their lifetime using the Monte Carlo simulation follows thereafter and the practicability of this method for reliability based design of wave-dissipating concrete blocks is shown.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 25 (1996): Proceedings of 25th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Orlando, Florida, 1996.
